name: Semi-ORBITAL RESCUE
description:
You are a mere rock floating in space

By gathering humans, you can take them to your final destination.

Gather as many as you can... if you can.

The only key used in this game is Up or Space to jump!

Made for the Trijam #44 in only 2 hours 50 minutes (and 40-something seconds)!

Challenges accepted:

  1. Use Godot Engine
  2. Make villain the hero (kind of...)
  3. Use complementary color scheme (the planet uses an orange/blue color scheme, the sun is orange-ish and the background is blue-ish, the big planet is purple and yellow)
  4. Implement double jump (in a space-themed game! A planet double jumps!)

Uses royalty-free music: 

Music from https://filmmusic.io "White" by Kevin MacLeod (https://incompetech.com) License: CC BY (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/)
